rows.label: qst102701_msg001
rows.name: おじいちゃんに病気に効く薬がほしいの(仮)

rows.label: qst102701_msg002
rows.name: 腕のいい医者探してきて(仮)

rows.label: qst102701_msg101
rows.name: 医者見つかった？(仮)

rows.label: qst102701_msg201
rows.name: 見つかって良かった(仮)

rows.label: qst102701_msg202
rows.name: 良いお薬作ってくれるといいんだけど

rows.label: qst102701_msg301
rows.name:
お薬作ってきてくれたんだ！
ありがとう！(仮)

rows.label: qst102701_msg302
rows.name: おじいちゃんに届けに行く！(仮)

rows.label: qst102701_msg0001
rows.name: Grandpa seems to be in a bad way...

rows.label: qst102701_msg0002
rows.name: He's getting worse than before...

rows.label: qst102701_msg0003
rows.name: Is Grandpa going to die?

rows.label: qst102701_msg0004
rows.name:
The problem was supposed to be
with his ether flow, right?

rows.label: qst102701_msg0005
rows.name:
I might be able to do something with
my power as the Master Blade.

rows.label: qst102701_msg0006
rows.name: Really? You can fix Grandpa?

rows.label: qst102701_msg0007
rows.name:
I can't heal him completely.
He's a Man-Eater, right?

rows.label: qst102701_msg0008
rows.name:
There's nothing I can do
for his human side.

rows.label: qst102701_msg0009
rows.name:
Then we'll see if we can't find a
good doctor to attend to him.

rows.label: qst102701_msg0010
rows.name:
Thank you!
Oh, one more thing...

rows.label: qst102701_msg0011
rows.name:
Please don't say anything
about this to Grandpa yet.

rows.label: qst102701_msg0012
rows.name:
If we don't find a doctor who
can help him, it'll just get his
hopes up for nothing.

rows.label: qst102701_msg0013
rows.name:
Don't look so down!
Rex'll help your grandpa, I know it.

rows.label: qst102701_msg0014
rows.name: Yeah! It's a promise.
